h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Wind Chime Location
content: The Wind Chime can be obtained from the first Shrine, Front Hills, in the Forest of Wolves in Black Wind Mountain. It is located just after the initial couple of enemies before the bamboo bridge and is hard to miss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Wind_Chime.md', within the main section titled 'Wind Chime', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Wind Chime Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Wind Chime can be obtained from the first Shrine, Front Hills, in the Forest of Wolves in Black Wind Mountain. It is located just after the initial couple of enemies before the bamboo bridge and is hard to miss.
